entry.title: Sunday night: Showers. Low 7.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Showers beginning early this evening and ending overnight then 30 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 late this evening. Low 7. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers in the morning and early in the afternoon. A few rain showers or wet snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 13. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few rain showers or wet snow ending in the evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023
